features: GET WRINKLES OUT ON THE GO. This handheld steamer steams multiple garments fast without waiting for water to reheat, so your clothes will look their best even when you're traveling or in a hurry..Special Features : Manual. Auto shut-off : No
COMPACT SIZE GREAT FOR TRAVEL. This garment steamer weighs only 1. 1 lbs. and the compact size is perfect for travel. A travel bag is included.

STEAM PUMP FOR 5 MINUTES OF CONTINUOUS STEAM: This handheld garment steamer has 800 watts of power to pump strong blasts of steam to remove wrinkles and freshen garments. Pumps 10 grams of continuous steam per minute.
READY TO STEAM IN 35 SECONDS. The handheld steamer for clothes heats up quickly so you never have to wait.
STEAMS IN ANY ORIENTATION: The nozzles on this clothing steamer are angled so it's comfortable to hold and easy on your wrists.
Designed for 120V, 60Hz power in US/Canada. Do not use Abroad without plug adapter AND voltage converter for local power to protect electronics.
body.description: Wrinkles don't stand a chance when you use the CHI Handheld Garment Steamer with 5 minutes of continuous steam. This compact, lightweight portable steamer weighs just 1. 1 lbs. and is great for traveling, with included travel bag. Preheats fast.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ready to steam in 35 seconds Heats up quickly so you never have to wait.

CHI Steam - From hair to wear. From one of the world-renowned brand that has innovated the haircare industry for over 30 years, comes a high-performance line of irons and steamers for all the fabrics of your home and wardrobe. Engineered with CHI flat iron technology, and designed for the modern home, these products deliver the precise results you can only expect from CHI. Whether you want to create a flawless look from head to toe for a milestone event, or have a perfectly-pressed outfit for your workday, it’s now easier. CHI Steam Handheld Garment Steamer for Clothes Get wrinkles out on the go Stubborn wrinkles don't stand a chance when you use the CHI Handheld Garment Steamer with 5 minutes of continuous steam. Quickly remove wrinkles from multiple garments without waiting for water to reheat mid-steam. The nozzles on the handheld garment steamer are angled so you can blast steam in any direction, while holding your wrist at a comfortable angle. With 800 watts of power, the steam pump blasts strong, continuous puffs of steam. The long 8' cord gives you plenty of reach when you need. Compact size great for travel Steam pump for 5 minutes of continuous steam Ready to steam in 35 seconds Long 6' cord Designed for 120V, 60Hz power in US/Canada. Do not use Abroad without plug adapter AND voltage converter for local power to protect electronics.

Get wrinkles out on the go Steam multiple garments fast without waiting for water to reheat, so your clothes will look their best even when you're traveling or in a hurry. Steams in any orientation The nozzles are angled so the steamer is comfortable to hold and easy on your wrists. Compact size great for travel Weighs only 1.1 lbs. and the compact size is perfect for travel. A travel bag is included. Steam pump for 5 minutes of continuous steam Has 800 watts of power to pump strong blasts of steam to remove wrinkles and freshen garments. Pumps 10 grams of continuous steam per minute.

CHI Mini Travel Iron with Electronic Temperature Control CHI Handheld Garment Steamer for 5 Minutes of Continuous Steam CHI Handheld Garment Steamer with 300ml Tank Iron ✓ Steamer ✓ ✓ ✓ Wattage 1000 800 1600

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working the second time - UPDATE
reviews.reviewText: I bought for traveling. The first time I used it, it worked well. The second trip I brought it on it said it had heated up but cold water just dripped from one of the holes - no steam or anything.UPDATE: Customer support was super helpful and replaced, now working and love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars FAILS AFTER MINIMAL USE
reviews.reviewText: *** Persistently Defective ***I have had three of these. The work good until they don't which is usually after a few uses and just outside of return window. The second one didn't work right out of the box. The third one lasted for only two travel events and minimal use. The failure mode: Heats up, when button pushed makes clicking sound, no steam is produced. This one is of course just outside of the return window.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable and gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: Pros:- Super portable. Same size as my hair straightening iron (which is the pink one on the comparison photo).- Has a steamer button that you hold down to release the steam, unlike some steamers that have no button- It works, unlike many so-called portable steamerCons:- Due to its portable size, you need to refill the water well if doing more than 3 shirts- Takes a little longer, due to its smaller size- The water well is hard to see, due to the red color of the windowOverall, it works.2 things to note:1. I took a pic of the door to the water refill compartment to show you how fragile it is. If it breaks off, you’ll need to buy a new steamer, since that door is what keeps the water contained.2. As with any portable steamer, you’re sacrificing size for efficacy. If you expect to steam your clothes quickly, then buy a full sized steamer. If you expect crisp creases as with an iron, then buy an iron, lol.I included pics of a button-down shirt and a silk tank top to show how the finished product using this steamer will look. Overall, I’m happy with it, since portability was my main objective. I definitely would not use this overseas since the intense voltage will blow out any converter, rendering this useless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the best
reviews.reviewText: I don't know why people don't like this steamer. I constantly travel - for work and with my family. This is the first thing I pack. I won't travel without it. Other steamers work for a few months, then take forever to heat and are constantly in a cycle of boiling water. This is easy and ready to use. The resevput may be smaller than some, but the fact that you get consistent steam makes it easy to overlook the size of the resevoir. I can usually get 3-5 garments steamed before refilling. It cools down nicely as well. As far as space goes, it's compact and I live how the shape makes it easy to pack things around. I say purchase it and give it a chance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel, underpowered
reviews.reviewText: Very portable and sturdy so far. Helps with minor wrinkles coming out of a suitcase. Tired of ironing and this gets you 60% of the way there. Won't get you pressed look but gets most wrinkles out. Heats up pretty quickly and I can do 4 shirts and 3 pants touched up with one reservoir.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Defective product, worthless warranty. Product is Hamilton Beach, not CHI.
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: Hamilton Beach's warranty is about as worthless as expected. When I reached out to them in September they told me they are out of stock and could not ship me a replacement. They would not refund me either. They only offered me a credit against a different CHI Steam (aka Hamilton Beach) product which is a joke because all their other products are irons and more expensive.They told me to check back in 6-8 weeks to see if they had restocked. So I set a reminder on my calendar (it's the principle of the matter, doggone it.) It's now 6-8 weeks later and they still do not have it in stock.DO NOT BUY THIS STEAMER.***I had the same experience as many other people who bought this product; it worked the first time then broke. Unfortunately, I was right outside the Amazon return window so I contacted CHI to get a warranty replacement.CHI's customer service responded right away and informed me that this garment steamer is NOT manufactured by them. They license their name to Hamilton Beach (i.e., a mass produced budget appliance company). So I have to reach out to Hamilton Beach for the warranty and good luck to me.Be warned that this is not actually a CHI product with the quality you would expect. It's just the CHI name slapped on a lower-quality brand. You are taking your chances buying this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best steamer I’ve ever purchased
reviews.reviewText: It’s super light and portable (the size of a hair straightener, possibly a little bigger)It works very well and is ready to go within seconds or turning on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Inconsistent steam, only for tiny easy jobs
reviews.reviewText: I’m spending a lot of time just WAITING and waiting for the next batch of steam to come out. You can do one lightweight easy item on one refill, but anything thicker like a jacket or wrinkled linen will require several refills and much frustration to complete. I couldn’t make much difference in my window curtain, for example. It’s still wrinkled.I’m actually an online reseller and got this promising steamer for the quality of the brand, compact size and unique ‘wand’ shape, that seems to beat everything else on the market.But nope, you’ll get frustrated. Steam shouldn’t stop mid-way randomly all the time. I’ve never had this issue with any other portable steamer I’ve owned.Also, don’t burn your house down. This thing doesn’t automatically shut off and stays pretty hot even after all the water evaporates. Be really, really careful and always unplug!
Pésimo producto, nunca saco vapor.No funciona
Original steamer had to be returned as water closure didn't close all the way and steamer wouldnt steam properly but easily replaced! Replacement unit is great!

I really want to like this, it seems perfect for travelling… but I won’t get the chance to enjoy it now as I’m leaving on a trip tomorrow and my brand new steamer doesn’t work! I’ve received 2 of these now and both arrived defective! The first order came on time, the box is fine, the steamer looks great and compact… but when I tested it out I found it doesn’t produce anything but a clicking sound and no steam. So annoying! Thankfully I tested it before packing for my trip! The return process was easy, and I was sent a replacement right away. I tested the replacement, and same thing happened. So disappointed! I will actually give it another try even though it’s too lake for this trip now … but I am hopeful for this to work out and maybe the third time will be lucky. I’ll update once I get the replacement of the replacement. 🤣It’s the most compact travel steamer I’ve seen, which is why I’m even bothering to try again. If you don’t really need to save space or don’t travel much, I would suggest you move on to something else and save the headache.
Perfect for travel and it works really well,
J’ai acheté cet article pour mon voyage en mars…
